Inboxes

List all inboxes

GET

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

inboxes

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/inboxes \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

403

404

Copy

```
{
  "payload": [\
    {\
      "id": 123,\
      "name": "<string>",\
      "website_url": "<string>",\
      "channel_type": "<string>",\
      "avatar_url": "<string>",\
      "widget_color": "<string>",\
      "website_token": "<string>",\
      "enable_auto_assignment": true,\

      "working_hours_enabled": true,\
      "enable_email_collect": true,\
      "csat_survey_enabled": true,\
      "auto_assignment_config": {},\
      "out_of_office_message": "<string>",\
      "working_hours": [\

```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

#### Response

200

200403404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-payload)

payload

object\[\]

Array of inboxes

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-id)

id

number

ID of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-name)

name

string

The name of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-website-url)

website\_url

string

Website URL

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-channel-type)

channel\_type

string

The type of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-avatar-url)

avatar\_url

string

The avatar image of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-widget-color)

widget\_color

string

Widget Color used for customization of the widget

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-website-token)

website\_token

string

Website Token

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-enable-auto-assignment)

enable\_auto\_assignment

boolean

The flag which shows whether Auto Assignment is enabled or not

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-web-widget-script)

web\_widget\_script

string

Script used to load the website widget

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-welcome-title)

welcome\_title

string

Welcome title to be displayed on the widget

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-welcome-tagline)

welcome\_tagline

string

Welcome tagline to be displayed on the widget

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-greeting-enabled)

greeting\_enabled

boolean

The flag which shows whether greeting is enabled

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-greeting-message)

greeting\_message

string

A greeting message when the user starts the conversation

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-channel-id)

channel\_id

number

ID of the channel this inbox belongs to

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-working-hours-enabled)

working\_hours\_enabled

boolean

The flag which shows whether working hours feature is enabled

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-enable-email-collect)

enable\_email\_collect

boolean

The flag to enable collecting email from contacts

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-csat-survey-enabled)

csat\_survey\_enabled

boolean

The flag to enable CSAT survey

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-auto-assignment-config)

auto\_assignment\_config

object

Configuration settings for auto assignment

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-out-of-office-message)

out\_of\_office\_message

string

Message to show when agents are out of office

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-working-hours)

working\_hours

object\[\]

Configuration for working hours of the inbox

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-day-of-week)

day\_of\_week

number

Day of the week (0-6, where 0 is Sunday)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-closed-all-day)

closed\_all\_day

boolean

Whether the inbox is closed for the entire day

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-open-hour)

open\_hour

number

Hour when inbox opens (0-23)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-open-minutes)

open\_minutes

number

Minutes of the hour when inbox opens (0-59)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-close-hour)

close\_hour

number

Hour when inbox closes (0-23)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-close-minutes)

close\_minutes

number

Minutes of the hour when inbox closes (0-59)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-open-all-day)

open\_all\_day

boolean

Whether the inbox is open for the entire day

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-timezone)

timezone

string

Timezone configuration for the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-callback-webhook-url)

callback\_webhook\_url

string

Webhook URL for callbacks

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-allow-messages-after-resolved)

allow\_messages\_after\_resolved

boolean

Whether to allow messages after a conversation is resolved

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-lock-to-single-conversation)

lock\_to\_single\_conversation

boolean

Whether to lock a contact to a single conversation

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-sender-name-type)

sender\_name\_type

string

Type of sender name to display (e.g., friendly)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-business-name)

business\_name

string

Business name associated with the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-hmac-mandatory)

hmac\_mandatory

boolean

Whether HMAC verification is mandatory

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-selected-feature-flags)

selected\_feature\_flags

object

Selected feature flags for the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-reply-time)

reply\_time

string

Expected reply time

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-messaging-service-sid)

messaging\_service\_sid

string

Messaging service SID for SMS providers

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-phone-number)

phone\_number

string

Phone number associated with the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-medium)

medium

string

Medium of communication (e.g., sms, email)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/inboxes/list-all-inboxes#response-provider)

provider

string

Provider of the channel
